heading: Router configuration wizard
intro: This wizard helps to configure your Freifunk router.

password.label: New router password
password.error.minLength: A password must have at least 6 characters.

routerLocation.headline: Router location
routerLocation.help: If you provide the location data for your router it will be visible in the Freifunk map. You can drag the map marker to the correct location or enter the location and address manually.

internetSharing.headline: Internet sharing
internetSharing.shareInternet.label: Share internet
internetSharing.help: THANK YOU! You decided to share your internet connection. To protect yourself from the Störerhaftung you can use a VPN service.

generateCertificate.label: Generate new VPN03 certificate and key for this router
generateCertificate.certificate.label: VPN certificate
generateCertificate.key.label: VPN key

ip.headline: IP addresses
ip.help: Your router requires IP addresses for communicating with other routers and with clients that connect to the access point. Freifunk uses both IPv4 (legacy) and IPv6 (recent).

register.label: Register new IP addresses
register.help: If this option is enabled, the wizard automatically registers new IP addresses for this router. Disable only if you already have IP addresses from the Freifunk Berlin IP registry.

meshLan.help: Allows you to connect the LAN ports of your router via a cable to other devices that also have this setting enabled. If you only have one router, this setting can be turned off. Then the LAN ports can be used to connect clients with a cable.
meshLan.label: Mesh via LAN

distribute.label: Distribute client IP addresses
distribute.help: At least one router in your local mesh (specifically: the local BATMAN-adv mesh) should distribute IP addresses for clients. If you share your internet connection with this router or if are unsure if there is another router in your neighborhood that distributes IPs, you should enable this setting.

subnet.label: Client IPv4 subnet
subnet.help: The IPv4 subnet from which IPs are distributed to clients that connect to your access point.

expectedClients.label: Expected number of concurrent clients
expectedClients.help: Please estimate how many clients will be connected to your access point at the same time.

advancedWifi.headline: Advanced wifi options
advancedWifi.help: By default your router is configured to connect automatically with other Freifunk routers that also have default settings. If you want to connect to a router with a special configuration, you can pick this router from a wifi scan or you can enter the configuration manually.
advancedWifi.channel.label: Channel

filter.label: Filter SSID by
filter.noresult: No scan results match the filter {{filter}}!

configIncorrect: The data you entered is invalid. Please correct them before saving.
